input.sentences: the window view hints at the glorious times that await them .
the waves are picking up as the anticipation is building .
finally a better glimpse of the old civilization brings relief .
they have arrived and begin the exploration .
the sun sets over a day well spent .
output.sentences: The view from my window on the airplane indicated fun times were coming soon.
Once we landed, the waves were really picking up and crashing against the building.
It was a relief to finally get a glimpse of dry land.
The fun and exploration began when I arrived to the mountain.
I spent my evenings watching beautiful sunsets.
